title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 22, subtit. D, ch. VI, form 16-g - Designation of institution for custody of defendant
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 22, subtit. D, ch. VI, form 16-g - Designation of institution for custody of defendant

State Regulations
C.P.L. Article 730
FORM 16-g
12/88
STATE OF NEW YORK
OFFICE OF MENTAL HEALTH/
OFFICE OF MENTAL RETARDATION AND DEVELOPMENTAL
DISABILITIES
DESIGNATION OF INSTITUTION FOR CUSTODY OF
DEFENDANT
NOTICE TO SHERIFF OR LOCAL DEPARTMENT OF
CORRECTION
TO: ________
________
________
________
Pursuant to the following designation and
order of court stated therein (copy attached), you are required to deliver the
defendant, ________, to the facility so designated. ________
Commissioner of (OMH) / (OMRDD)
NOTICE TO DIRECTOR OF FACILITY
TO: ________
________
________
________
Pursuant to the following designation and
order of court stated therein, your facility has been designated as appropriate
for care and treatment of the named defendant. Such defendant will be delivered
to your facility by the appropriate sheriff or local department of
correction. ____________
Commissioner of (OMH) / (OMRDD)
DESIGNATION
The ________ Court, ________ County, has
committed to my custody ________, the defendant in a criminal proceeding
pending in such court, pursuant to an order dated ________ (copy attached). I
hereby designate ________as the appropriate facility for the care and treatment
of such defendant. Dated: ____________
___________
For the Commissioner of (OMH)
(OMRDD)

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 22, subtit. D, ch. VI, form
16-g

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
